content.rendered:
Play Count Masters – Stickman Clash

Count Masters is an interesting online game that is also available on mobile devices.

It offers unique gameplay where your main objective will be to defeat your opponents and avoid obstacles in the process. It’s interesting in a sense that your army can only get larger by walking through a gate.

  • Count Masters is a 3d running game. Pick the right gate and make your army larger.

The number written on the gate signifies the number by which your army will grow larger. Pick the right gate so that you get as many warriors as possible. You will need the warriors to defeat all of your enemies.
So be sure to try the game out!

Controls : Mouse – Movement

How to Play Count Masters: Stickman Games

Choose the best gate, pass through it, and bring stickman warriors together to clash with the opposing crowd. Become the crowd master and lead your people through the crowded city till the end of this epic race. Crash obstacles and beat everyone on your way, collect coins and upgrade your levels. Defeat the King-stickman in the final battle and take the castle!
